h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Just past where the was stationed, you can spot a glowing pot in the corner. Break it open to gain a new **Awaken Wine Worm** , and be sure to travel back to the Shen Monkey to upgrade your Gourd (and make sure you grabbed the new items he sells!).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 4)'.
The content is as follows:
Just past where the was stationed, you can spot a glowing pot in the corner. Break it open to gain a new **Awaken Wine Worm** , and be sure to travel back to the Shen Monkey to upgrade your Gourd (and make sure you grabbed the new items he sells!).
